segments.text: Congratulations , Vivian . You won the grand prize , again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't it just great ! I just knew I'd win !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did ? How ? Did you wear red underwear again this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me ! Tell me ! What's your secret ? !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK . I'll whisper it to you , but you have to promise not to tell anyone !
segments.speaker: S2
